manifest.name: Pirate's Booty Pack
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: Embark on a swashbuckling adventure with these pirate-themed quests and treasures.

quests.title: Swab the Deck
quests.description: Mop the kitchen or bathroom floor.

quests.title: Bury the Treasure
quests.description: Put away your toys or belongings in their proper chest.

quests.title: Map the Seas
quests.description: Draw a treasure map of your house or yard.

quests.title: Find the X
quests.description: Complete a treasure hunt set up by the Quartermaster (a parent).

quests.title: Share the Booty
quests.description: Share a snack or toy with a sibling or friend.

quests.title: Hoist the Colors
quests.description: Help raise or lower a flag, or help with laundry.

markets.title: The Smuggler's Cove
markets.description: A secret port for trading pirate treasures and gear.

gameAssets.name: Pirate Eyepatch
gameAssets.description: A classic eyepatch for a swashbuckling avatar.

gameAssets.name: Parrot Companion
gameAssets.description: A colorful parrot to sit on your avatar's shoulder.

gameAssets.name: Piece of Eight
gameAssets.description: A golden coin that can be traded for a small treat.
